zone.line: Then is made full the circle of her light
And as she grows, her beams more
bright & bright
Are poured from Heaven, where she is
hovering then
A wonder & a sign to mortal men.
The Son of Saturn with this glorious Power
Mingled in love & sleep — to whom she bare
Pandeia, a bright maid of beauty rare
Among the Gods whose life lives eternal are.
Hail Queen, great Moon, white armed
Divinity
Fair-haired & favourable, thus with thee
My song beginning, by its music sweet
Shall make immortal many a
glorious
to t hers the enskied moon feat
Of demigods; with lovely lips, so well

line.del: Which minstrels, servants of the Muses,

zone.line: Whose mouths are sweet as love,
tell.
such themes belong:
